verses.text: I \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w that|strong="G4160"\w*, \w first|strong="G4412"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w supplications|strong="G1162"\w*, \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w*, \w intercessions|strong="G1783"\w*, \add and\add* giving of \w thanks|strong="G2169"\w*, be \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*;

\w For|strong="G5228"\w* \w kings|strong="G0935"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add for\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w authority|strong="G5247"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w lead|strong="G1236"\w* a \w quiet|strong="G2263"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peaceable|strong="G2272"\w* \w life|strong="G0979"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honesty|strong="G4587"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G0587"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* will \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* to be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \add there is\add* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w* between \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*;

Who \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* a \w ransom|strong="G0487"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, to be \w testified|strong="G3142"\w* in \w due|strong="G2398"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w Where|strong="G3739"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* am \w ordained|strong="G5087"\w* a \w preacher|strong="G2783"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w*, (I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \add and\add* \w lie|strong="G5574"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*;) a \w teacher|strong="G1320"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w verity|strong="G0225"\w*.

I \w will|strong="G1014"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G4336"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w where|strong="G5117"\w*, lifting \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w holy|strong="G3741"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doubting|strong="G1261"\w*.

In like \w manner|strong="G5615"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w that|strong="G2885"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w adorn|strong="G2885"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w modest|strong="G2887"\w* \w apparel|strong="G2689"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w shamefacedness|strong="G0127"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sobriety|strong="G4997"\w*; \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* broided \w hair|strong="G4117"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w gold|strong="G5557"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w pearls|strong="G3135"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w costly|strong="G4185"\w* \w array|strong="G2441"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* (\w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w becometh|strong="G4241"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w professing|strong="G1861"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2317"\w*) \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G3129"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w silence|strong="G2271"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w subjection|strong="G5292"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w suffer|strong="G2010"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* to \w teach|strong="G1321"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* to usurp authority \w over|strong="G0831"\w* the \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w silence|strong="G2271"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Adam|strong="G0076"\w* \w was|strong="G4111"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w formed|strong="G4111"\w*, \w then|strong="G1534"\w* \w Eve|strong="G2096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Adam|strong="G0076"\w* \w was|strong="G0538"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w deceived|strong="G0538"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* being \w deceived|strong="G0538"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w transgression|strong="G3847"\w*.

\w Notwithstanding|strong="G1161"\w* she shall be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* \w childbearing|strong="G5042"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* they \w continue|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w holiness|strong="G0038"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w sobriety|strong="G4997"\w*.
